channel.title: Tales on Vanessa Guedes
channel.description: Recent content in Tales on Vanessa Guedes

item.title: Ana wakes up
item.description: “Don’t look in the mirror before three days or you’ll see the devil”. She looked. She saw just her own face stained with dried brown blood, her ratty hair and sunken eyes with dark circles. Looking frightful as the devil himself, she thought. She took a hot shower, got rid of the cakey brown goop, the strong scent of lavender and the laurel leaves still clinging to her body. Her hair still had a leftover hint of rue, but the scent of the deodorant somehow masked it.
